name: There's No Place Like Home
description:
There's No Place Like Home

--------------------------

Thanks to Global Warming(TM), the weather has been getting much worse lately. You've decided you've had enough and are set on leaving your home by space ship. Unfortunately, your main generator is busted and you must rely on the hand-cranked back up generator to fully power your ship and leave the planet.

Plug the generator into the socket of the machine you wish to power and crank the generator. Make sure to power your shield in time for the frequent asteroid storms!

Made for Ludum Dare 39 by Remy Stuurwold  

Download below! Or click here to play in browser:  
https://itch.io/embed-upload/558098?color=0c42bb

Controls
--------
A/D - Move Left/Right
SPACE - Interact
ENTER - Restart
ESC - Quit

Contact
